title: Artificial Intelligence
subtitle: Explore the foundations of intelligent systems and algorithms

topics.title: Introduction to AI
topics.description: Definition, importance, history, milestones, types, and applications of AI.

topics.title: Fundamentals of AI
topics.description: Intelligent agents, problem-solving, search strategies, and game playing.

topics.title: Knowledge Representation and Reasoning
topics.description: Logic, inference mechanisms, knowledge-based systems, and ontologies.

topics.title: Machine Learning Basics
topics.description: Introduction to ML, workflow, overfitting, underfitting, and bias-variance tradeoff.

topics.title: Supervised Learning
topics.description: Regression, classification, ensemble methods, and evaluation metrics.

topics.title: Unsupervised Learning
topics.description: Clustering, dimensionality reduction, and association rule learning.

topics.title: Reinforcement Learning
topics.description: Basics, MDPs, Q-learning, and deep reinforcement learning.

topics.title: Neural Networks and Deep Learning
topics.description: Artificial neurons, backpropagation, CNNs, RNNs, GANs, and transfer learning.

topics.title: Natural Language Processing (NLP)
topics.description: Text preprocessing, language modeling, transformers, and NLP applications.

topics.title: Computer Vision
topics.description: Image processing, classification, object detection, and segmentation.

topics.title: Advanced AI Topics
topics.description: Explainable AI, ethics, privacy, and autonomous systems.

topics.title: Tools, Libraries, and Frameworks
topics.description: Python, essential libraries, ML/DL frameworks, deployment, and version control.

topics.title: AI Trends and Future Scope
topics.description: AI in industries, AGI, emerging trends, and career paths.
